tool.name: HeidelTime
tool.help:
**What it does**
Adds time annotations to a tokenized document.
**Required annotations**
* Tokens with `Penn part of speech tags <https://www.ling.upenn.edu/courses/Fall_2003/ling001/penn_treebank_pos.html>`_ in GATE XML format (will automatically convert from LIF) * Sentences in GATE XML format (will automatically convert from LIF)
